data.title: 101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure | Full Movie | Movies Anywhere
data.meta_description: Purchase 101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure on digital and stream instantly or download offline. The adventure begins when Pongo and Perdita's pup Patch, who is not satisfied being just one out of 101, gets the chance to meet his TV hero, Thunderbolt, the One-Of-A-Kind Wonderdog. When Thunderbolt's trusty sidekick Lightning reveals that the show's producers are on the lookout for a new star, Thunderbolt with Patch in tow struts out into the real world to perform true acts of heroism. And when puppy-obsessed Cruella De Vil returns, it's Patch and Thunderbolt's teamwork and friendship that will save the day.
